text: Heliconia paludigena is a species of plant in the family Heliconiaceae.José E. Abalo & Gustavo Morales L. 1983. Phytologia 52(6): 402-403, f. sn., Heliconia paludigena It is endemic to Ecuador.http Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Heliconia paludigenaUlloa Ulloa, C. & Pitman, N. 2004.
